page.title: 15Leisure in Askern
page.content: { }In the area we have many choices of recreation and leisure available. We have The{Lake}for boating and fishing and{Campsall park}for guided tours around the woods and you may also play games such as football and golf. The{Claypond,}a very popular fishing pool,is also in Campsall Park. We have a{BMX COURSE}that is mainly used by children,and a{Golf Course for adults close by.The {Swimming Baths}are well used by all age-groups and{Smeaton Crags}are well-known for family walks, sight- seeing, Bird watching and picnics.{The {Welfare Ground }is mainly used for cricket which is played all through the summer.Round the cricket field is a track which is used for running. Finally{Askern Library}is used by all age-groups and is especially popular with the elderly.
